seed_song.track_name: Standing in the Way of Control

segue_the_chain: Beth Ditto sang ‘Cruel Intentions’ on Simian Mobile Disco’s album ‘Temporary Pleasure’, on which this song also appeared…

segue_dave.line: Gossip released records for K Records, a label founded in 1982, while The Jam broke up in the same year...
segue_dave.explanation: Gossip released a former album with K Records, a record label which was founded in 1982 and The Jam was formed as a band in the same year.
